EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Phoenix Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Postponed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Phoenix
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for expressing interest in Pivotal's Big Data Roadshow: Phoenix.
We are currently updating the agenda and adding new speakers. In order to accommodate these changes, we have decided to postpone this event to a later date.
When the new date is determined, you will receive another email with the details and additional information. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Should you have questions or concerns please contact Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
